ideas: Daily collaboration with the client is key.
Changing requirements are inevitable, welcome them.
Working software is the primary measure of progress.

frontmatter.principle: Success comes from empowered individuals in self-organizing teams
ideas: Successful projects involve trusted and motivated individuals.
Self-organizing teams lead to the best architectures, requirements, and designs.

frontmatter.principle: Sustainable development from simplicity, continuous delivery, and excellence
ideas: Continuous delivery of working software, as quickly as possible.
Sustainable development can be maintained indefinitely.
